challenges.description: Get an Arcane or Dextrous Prayer Scroll
Get a Lightbearer or Osmumten's Fang
Get a CoX Weapon(butt plug counts, so does Dinny B lmao)
Get 2 raid armor drops(Masori/Justi/Ancestral. Shields don't count). If Pana gets the chaps, complete the tile.
Get an Arcane or Dextrous Prayer Scroll
Get a CoX Weapon(butt plug counts, so does Dinny B lmao)

Mechanical.description: Kill any 3 awakened bosses. You can do the same boss multiple times.
Punch/Kick Jad to death. You can do the single Jad Challenge. Screenshot must verify no weapon in inventory. No lame stuff like veng/thralls
Get back-to-back sub 7-minute completions of the Corrupted Gauntlet
Complete 2 grandmaster tasks. They cannot be repeat tasks; gotta be new. Poki's team needs to complete 3.  l m a o
Kill Vet'ion at 1hp in Full Dharok's

Skilling.description: Get a Tome of Fire
Get any Tempoross Unique. Pages that replace unique count
Get any Mahogany Homes Unique.
G O U T T U B E R
Get 20 Unidentified Minerals
Create a Weiss portal in your nexus from scratch (mine the salt)
Pickpocket 4 Enhanced Crystal Teleport Seeds
Get a unigue from Guardians of the Rift
Get a Log Basket from Forestry from scratch
Get a Farmer's Outfit piece from Tithe Farm
Get a Star Fragment from Shooting Stars
Get a Smith's Outfit piece from Giant's Foundry
Finish any tier of an achievement diary for a region
Get 100 Sq'irkjuice from Sorceress's Garden
Generate a 50 stack of Marks of Grace on the Ardy Rooftop spawn
Acquire a Golden Tench
Acquire a Ring of Endurance
Make a Colossal Blade from scratch
Get that stupid pirate hook thing from the Brimhaven Agility Course
Pickpocket 4 Blood Shards
Get something dope from Zalcano

Clogging.description: Obtain a Bryophyta's Essence
Get a Black Tourmaline Core
Get any boot drop from a medium clue
Get any Revenant Weapon
Get a Champion Scroll
Obtain a complete barb assault outfit(except torso)(you can pick the hat)
Get a Pharaoh's Sceptre
Any 1 player earn 34 castle wars tickets(enough for a decorative armor set)
I N F I N I T Y P I E C E
OBOR CLUB THING
Get full Ancient Ceremonial lmao
Get a zealot armor piece
Get one of those lock things from that morytania minigame
Get 30 total brimstone keys from scratch
Get 10 beginner clue uniques as a team
Get a master clue demon mask
Get a gnome scarf or gnome goggles
unlock a godsword spec from LMS from scratch
Get 2 obsidian drops(none of those rings)
Get whatever a Mask of Ranul is
Get 5 chewed bones and sacrifice them
Get a Dagon'Hai Piece

Early Game.description: Get 2 Malediction or Odium Shard things
Get a dragonbone necklace or 5 vorkath heads
F e d o r a

Mid Game.description: Get 2 zulrah drops or a mutagen
Get 3 Venator Shards. If you get one from a cache, complete the tile
Get 3 Cerberus Uniques. Pegasian Crystal counts for 2.
Complete an Abyssal Bludgeon(as a team, specific parts don't matter)
Get an Enhanced Weapon Seed or 4 Armor Seeds
Get a Ring of the Gods

Late Game.description: Get an Arcane or Dextrous Prayer Scroll
Get a Lightbearer or Osmumten's Fang
Get a Hydra Claw or Hydra Leather
Get a CoX Weapon(butt plug counts, so does Dinny B lmao)
Get 2 raid armor drops(Masori/Justi/Ancestral. Shields don't count). If Pana gets the chaps, complete the tile.

End Game.description: Get an Inquisitor Drop(mace counts) or orb(staff doesn't count lmao)
Get any Mega Rare or Dragon Claws
Get 3 nex uniques. Hilt counts for 2.
Get a CM or HM Tob Kit/Dust
Get 2 Torva Drops. If Durty gets the Helmet, complete the tile.

MYSTERY.description: Pay to win: Donate 50m to the clan or go backwards l m a o
Every teammate has to get a ToB kc. It's cool if people that go out of town or whatever don't do it. Noobs have to get carried though.
SHANE TRAIN: Get a deathless Trio CM CoX Kc. Only one player is allowed to click in between phases at Olm. The players must form a train by following each other.
5 teammates must win a hard game of Pest control. You get two tries. !roll_back if you fail
Carry 5 0-20 kc'ers in ToB. Rando's from 416 count for 2.
Get any drop in a quantity of 69. Must show the runelite drop thingy.
4 teammates must get 4 different hats from Barb assault. Take a dope screenshot of your new hats.
